languages.text: {n}Покрытый с головы до ног собственной и друкарской кровью, Ахиллеас Скаландр загнанно озирается по сторонам. Сконцентрировав, наконец, взгляд на вас, он едва слышно выдыхает:{/n} "Да охранит меня Бог-Император... неужели... это и правда вы, Ваша Светлость?.." {n}Он мучительно закашливается, не найдя на золотой цепочке свой респиратор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Покрытый с головы до ног собственной и друкарской кровью, Ахиллеас Скаландр загнанно озирается по сторонам. Сконцентрировав, наконец, взгляд на вас, он едва слышно выдыхает:{/n} "Да охранит меня Бог-Император... неужели... это и правда вы, Ваша Светлость?.." {n}Он мучительно закашливается, не найдя на золотой цепочке свой респиратор.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Covered in Drukhari blood and his own, Achilleas Scalander looks around with a haunted expression on his face. He finally manages to focus his gaze on you and lets out a barely audible gasp.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve me... Could it be... Is it truly you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}He is struck by an excruciating coughing fit, his hand grasping for his respirator on its golden chain, but it is missing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}デュカーリと自身の血にまみれたアキレアス・スカランダーは、苦悩の表情を浮かべて周囲を見渡している。彼はようやくこちらと目を合わせると、かろうじて聞こえるほどわずかに息を飲んだ。{/n}「神帝陛下、感謝いたします…本当に…本当に陛下なのですか？」{n}彼は耐え切れないとでもいうように立て続けに咳をし、金色の鎖につけられていた、今は失われた呼吸器を手に取ろうとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covered in Drukhari blood and his own, Achilleas Scalander looks around with a haunted expression on his face. He finally manages to focus his gaze on you and lets out a barely audible gasp.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve me... Could it be... Is it truly you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}He is struck by an excruciating coughing fit, his hand grasping for his respirator on its golden chain, but it is missing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリと自身の血にまみれたアキレアス・スカランダーは、苦悩の表情を浮かべて周囲を見渡している。彼はようやくこちらと目を合わせると、かろうじて聞こえるほどわずかに息を飲んだ。{/n}「神帝陛下、感謝いたします…本当に…本当に陛下なのですか？」{n}彼は耐え切れないとでもいうように立て続けに咳をし、金色の鎖につけられていた、今は失われた呼吸器を手に取ろうとした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德一脸茫然，浑身上下沾满了黑暗灵族的鲜血与他自己的鲜血。他用尽力气，将目光定格在你的身上，发出了一声几不可闻的低吟。{/n}“神皇保佑……难道……难道您真的来了，舰长大人？”{n}他猛地剧烈咳嗽起来，连忙伸手去抓金链上的呼吸器，但呼吸器早已不知所踪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covered in Drukhari blood and his own, Achilleas Scalander looks around with a haunted expression on his face. He finally manages to focus his gaze on you and lets out a barely audible gasp.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve me... Could it be... Is it truly you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}He is struck by an excruciating coughing fit, his hand grasping for his respirator on its golden chain, but it is missing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德一脸茫然，浑身上下沾满了黑暗灵族的鲜血与他自己的鲜血。他用尽力气，将目光定格在你的身上，发出了一声几不可闻的低吟。{/n}“神皇保佑……难道……难道您真的来了，舰长大人？”{n}他猛地剧烈咳嗽起来，连忙伸手去抓金链上的呼吸器，但呼吸器早已不知所踪。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cubierto de sangre, tanto Drukhari como suya, Achilleas Scalander mira a su alrededor con rostro de espanto. Por fin logra centrar su mirada en ti y suelta un jadeo prácticamente inaudible.{/n} «Que el Dios Emperador me proteja... ¿Es posible...? ¿De verdad es usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}Sufre un doloroso ataque de tos. Alarga la mano al respirador de su cadena de oro, pero no está.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covered in Drukhari blood and his own, Achilleas Scalander looks around with a haunted expression on his face. He finally manages to focus his gaze on you and lets out a barely audible gasp.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve me... Could it be... Is it truly you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}He is struck by an excruciating coughing fit, his hand grasping for his respirator on its golden chain, but it is missing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cubierto de sangre, tanto Drukhari como suya, Achilleas Scalander mira a su alrededor con rostro de espanto. Por fin logra centrar su mirada en ti y suelta un jadeo prácticamente inaudible.{/n} «Que el Dios Emperador me proteja... ¿Es posible...? ¿De verdad es usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}Sufre un doloroso ataque de tos. Alarga la mano al respirador de su cadena de oro, pero no está.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'air hagard, Achilleas Scalander est couvert de sang : celui de Drukharis, mais aussi le sien. Malgré son trouble, il parvient à fixer son regard sur vous et laisse échapper un hoquet de surprise à peine audible.{/n} « Que l'Empereur-Dieu me préserve... Est-ce... Est-ce bien vous, Votre Seigneurie ? » {n}Soudain, il est pris d'une terrible quinte de toux et sa main cherche à s'emparer de son respirateur, habituellement attaché à une chaîne en or, mais celui-ci semble avoir disparu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covered in Drukhari blood and his own, Achilleas Scalander looks around with a haunted expression on his face. He finally manages to focus his gaze on you and lets out a barely audible gasp.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve me... Could it be... Is it truly you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}He is struck by an excruciating coughing fit, his hand grasping for his respirator on its golden chain, but it is missing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air hagard, Achilleas Scalander est couvert de sang : celui de Drukharis, mais aussi le sien. Malgré son trouble, il parvient à fixer son regard sur vous et laisse échapper un hoquet de surprise à peine audible.{/n} « Que l'Empereur-Dieu me préserve... Est-ce... Est-ce bien vous, Votre Seigneurie ? » {n}Soudain, il est pris d'une terrible quinte de toux et sa main cherche à s'emparer de son respirateur, habituellement attaché à une chaîne en or, mais celui-ci semble avoir disparu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Achilleas Scalander, bedeckt mit Drukhari-Blut und seinem eigenen, blickt sich mit einem verstörten Gesichtsausdruck um. Schließlich gelingt es ihm, seinen Blick auf dich zu konzentrieren, und er schnappt kaum hörbar nach Luft.{/n} "Der Gottimperator bewahre mich ... Ist es möglich ...? Seid Ihr es wirklich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Er wird von einem quälenden Hustenanfall geschüttelt und die Hand greift nach seinem Atemgerät an der goldenen Kette, doch es ist nicht mehr da.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covered in Drukhari blood and his own, Achilleas Scalander looks around with a haunted expression on his face. He finally manages to focus his gaze on you and lets out a barely audible gasp.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve me... Could it be... Is it truly you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}He is struck by an excruciating coughing fit, his hand grasping for his respirator on its golden chain, but it is missing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas Scalander, bedeckt mit Drukhari-Blut und seinem eigenen, blickt sich mit einem verstörten Gesichtsausdruck um. Schließlich gelingt es ihm, seinen Blick auf dich zu konzentrieren, und er schnappt kaum hörbar nach Luft.{/n} "Der Gottimperator bewahre mich ... Ist es möglich ...? Seid Ihr es wirklich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Er wird von einem quälenden Hustenanfall geschüttelt und Hand greift nach seinem Atemgerät an der goldenen Kette, doch es ist nicht mehr da.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hissettiği dehşet çehresine vuran Achilleas Scalander, hem Drukhari hem de kendi kanıyla kaplı hâlde etrafına bakıyor. Gözünü nihayet sana çevirdiğinde duyması zorca soluyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator esirgesin... Yoksa... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sahiden huzurunuzda mıyım?" {n}Fena hâlde öksürüğe tutulup boynundaki altın zincirini yokluyor ancak aradığı solunum maskesini bulamıyor.{/n}
